settings.show_all_items_in_top_cards: Show all items in top cards (or only one item related to the sorting)
settings.show_all_items_in_bottom_cards: Show all items in bottom cards (or only one item related to the sorting)

admin.go_to_user_directory_extension: Go to User Directory extension with more settings
admin.go_to_this_extension: Go to Better User Directory extension with more settings
